import React, { useState } from "react"; const Form = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: "", gender: "", age: "", }); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData((prevData) => ({ ...prevData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value, })); console.log(e.target.value); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Handle form submission logic here console.log(formData); }; return (
{/* */}
); }; export default Form;
